desc: Ballot version for STU 1 FHIR Clinical Documents
descmd: Ballot version for STU 1 FHIR Clinical Documents
title: FHIR Clinical Documents
introduction: This implementation guide defines a canonical representation of a clinical document in FHIR. It serves as a common universal starting point for those creating their own FHIR clinical document specifications, and supports CDA users who wish to migrate to a FHIR-based representation of clinical documents. The intent of the HL7 Structured Documents WG that this IG replace the current FHIR R4 and R5 Core Clinical Document guidance
